item.description:
Weather looks nice this weekend - Let's get out and hit...

Dave will be hosting Saturdays meetup at Dugger Park in Medford and I'll be hosting Sunday afternoons.

Please RSVP on the Meetup.com site by clicking the link in the email. We like to get a rough head-count so we know how many people will be attending.

For those who haven't been, Dugger Park (five courts) is not far from the Tufts courts and you can Google Map the address above for directions.

If you don't know your "level," no worries. If you have an idea though, please list it when you RSVP as it'll help us group players of similar levels on courts. --Thanks, Dave.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask, "Are you with the meetup?" To find me (Dave), see my pic and look for a guy w/ glasses and a right kneepad.
item.name: Tennis Saturday at Dugger Park - Medford
